term.longtitle: IUPAC Gold Book - small particle in radiation scattering
term.title: small particle

item.text: A particle much smaller than the wavelength of the radiation in the medium. In practice, all dimensions of a particle considered small must be less than about one-twentieth of the wavelength employed.
